Data Fields
device_i2c_cfg_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Device Configuration

Data structure for an I2C device (SCL and SDA lines) More...

#include <device_config.h>

Collaboration diagram for device_i2c_cfg_t:

Detailed Description

This structure defines the data structure for configuring a device driver that uses the I2C bus.

Data Fields

u16 slave_addr
 The I2C Slave address.
